** TAKES EFFECT JULY 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 267 OF 2012 **
The Division of Drug Control shall enter and inspect the office of a dentist, physician, or podiatrist who holds:
An initial dispensing permit:
Within 6 months after receiving the report required under § 12-102(i)(1) of this subtitle; and
At least one more time during the duration of the permit; and
A renewed dispensing permit at least two times during the duration of the permit.
The Division of Drug Control promptly shall report the results of the inspections required under subsection (a) of this section to the respective board of licensure.
